name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of December 19, multiple earthquakes occurred in Jishishan, Linxia, Gansu.
At 23:59 on December 18, a magnitude 6.2 earthquake occurred in Jishishan County, Linxia Prefecture, Gansu, with a focal depth of 10 kilometers. As of 00:48 on December 19, a total of 32 aftershocks were recorded, with the largest magnitude being 4.0.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of 4:00 Beijing time, the 6.2-magnitude earthquake in Jishishan County, Linxia Prefecture, Gansu Province has caused 86 deaths and 96 injuries. Houses and infrastructure such as water, electricity, and roads in and around the epicenter were damaged to varying degrees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some students said that the subsidy was issued today.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 19, Qinghai Province. A netizen posted a message asking for help, saying that the earthquake in Dongtian Village, Qinghai Province caused the main canal to crack, and the Yellow River branch water rushed down from the mountain and turned into a mudslide. According to local villagers, more than 20 people have lost contact, and there is a lack of supplies and rescue personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 5 pm on December 19, a student at Tsinghua University Shenzhen International Graduate School jumped off a building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
When the earthquake occurred in the early morning of December 19, some university students broke down the doors to escape because the dormitory doors were locked at night and the dormitory managers did not open the doors in time.
Some students said that it was not until today that they realized that Urumqi was not far away from us

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, in Jishishan County, Linxia Prefecture, Gansu Province, some people transported a truckload of cotton clothes, quilts and other supplies to the scene at their own expense.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On December 19, an elderly man sat in protest on the streets of Qingdao, Shandong Province, with a sign

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, during the election for the president of the Foreign Students' Association at Seokyung University in South Korea, a Hong Kong student caused dissatisfaction among Chinese students because he did not indicate "Hong Kong, China" in his campaign materials but only marked "Hong Kong", and they accused him of being a Hong Kong independence supporter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, a video showed that a middle school announced that due to the cold weather, the daily arrival time was changed from 5:50 a.m. to before 6:10 a.m., which caused students to high-five and cheer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Indeed"
At the 2023 Phoenix Finance Annual Meeting, economist Guan Qingyou said that it is already quite impressive that the Shanghai Composite Index can maintain 3,000 points.
"3,000 points is not enough to reflect the current basic characteristics. In fact, if you look at the ChiNext and the Shanghai and Shenzhen 300, it is much worse than 3,000 points."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 18, owners of Helenberg in Tianxin District, Changsha, protested against their rights by demanding the release of their new house.
